mapper.update: update t_article set comment_counts = comment_counts + 1 where id = #{articleId}
update t_article set support_counts = #{beforeSupportCounts} + 1 where id = #{articleId}
update t_article set support_counts = #{beforeSupportCounts} - 1 where id = #{articleId}
update t_article set save_counts = #{beforeSaveCounts} + 1 where id = #{articleId}
update t_article set save_counts = #{beforeSaveCounts} - 1 where id = #{articleId}
update t_article set is_delete = 1 where id = #{articleId}
mapper.select: select support_counts from t_article where id = #{articleId}
select count(*) from t_article where author_account = #{userAccount}
select visit_permission from t_article where id = #{articleId}
select * from t_article as article where article.id >= (RAND()*(select MAX(id) from t_article)) LIMIT #{randArticleNumber}
select * from t_article where weight = 1 and is_delete = 0 order by create_date desc limit #{officialArticleNumber}
select * from t_article where weight = 0 and is_delete = 0 order by view_counts desc limit #{hotArticleLimit}
select * from t_article where weight = 0 and is_delete = 0 order by create_date desc limit #{newArticleLimit}
